website_summaries.verdict: A durable scooter designed for adults who are looking for a more eco-friendly way to get to and from work.
pros: This electric scooter is built to carry up to 264 pounds when fully loaded
It features a bright LED headlight, 8.5-inch shock-absorbing pneumatic tires, and rear disc brakes
Under optimum conditions, the scooter can travel at 15.5 mph
cons: The latch that holds the scooter closed when it is folded down for transport has a tendency to pop open

customer_reviews.title: Great and Powerful scooter
customer_reviews.text: love this scooter. it came nicely packaged and everything seems to be of high quality. i love details with light, bell, and power indicator. the disk brake provides great stopping power.
customer_reviews.author: G. Leong

customer_reviews.title: Best Scooter
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect gift. She used it everyday to compute to And from work. She’s had it for about a month and it works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: jackie

customer_reviews.title: A lot slower than expected
customer_reviews.text: A lot slower than expected. Battery life goes down a lot faster than advertised. Don’t even bother going up hill you should probably just walk. If you expect this to be just like a Bird or other type of scooter you maybe have ridden then you are wrong the experience is not the same. Luckily the folding is nice so you can keep it out of the way.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Levesque

customer_reviews.title: Makes a loud clicking noise
customer_reviews.text: I was pumped. It came almost ready to roll. 15 minutes into my 1st ride it started making a clicking noise from the rear wheel on acceleration. It is also vibrating while driving. Looks cool, battery seems strong, feels like back tire will fall off, but it is tight. When I spin it by hand, it is very smooth. Sad dad here. 05/14/19 I would like to add the MEGAWHEELS has been extremely positive and helpful. They said they are sending a replacement scooter. I can't wat
customer_reviews.author: C. A. Anderson Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Steering column hook failed while riding
customer_reviews.text: The hook that holds the scooter’s steering column up failed while I was riding in a busy area. It almost caused me to fall off. That small part could cause a serious injury to someone. Contacting customer service and will update this review later.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Clarke

customer_reviews.title: Very low quality or defected model
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my teenage daughter for her graduation. Finally we had a chance to test ride yesterday and it was complete failure. First, when she was carrying it, the clip broke off. When she made sharp turns the steering bar has tendency to twist. You don’t get as many miles as described one a full charge and the scooter is slower than described. So far it is really hard to enjoy it because of a lot of problems. We don't know its the low quality in general or we just got defected unit.
customer_reviews.author: Tomas P Pawlak

customer_reviews.title: Great scooter
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 6'3" 250lb guy and this scooter works for me. I ride it often and it's a wonderful experience. I'd say I am for sure only getting about 8 miles per charge but hey I'm heavy and there's lots of inclines around here. The motor is silent and able to take me around town at a nice 10mph cruse. I love the regenerative breaks and the rear light. I would recommend this scooter after having rode this one and the GoTrax ones. I like this better but both are nice
customer_reviews.author: Maximilian Funke

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I use this scooter to get home from work which is an 8 mile distance. I fully charge it and when I went above 8.4 miles it died. There was no weather factors just 2 hills and i expected the factors to bring it the mileage down. I Did not expect it to bring it down by 5 miles on a full charge. The lock switch also unlock on me and folded while operating. It's also heavy. Gave me a couple of bruises bringing it to my destination.
customer_reviews.author: fredstar

customer_reviews.title: After 1 month use -> Only get 3.5 mile range on flat roads, NOT 13 miles range as claimed on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Like other reviewers, this scooter is very difficult to lock as they design alignment is very bad. There is no speedometer, so you cant see how fast you are going Handles well over bumps. The most crucial utility of the scooter is in its range and speed. Here it fails miserably. The average range is just shy of 3.5 miles on flat roads, less if you encounter hills or a slop. The speed drops dramatically when you reach 3 bars on the control and will never recover. "13 Miles Long Range Battery" claim on Amazon - FAIL!!! So this device is only good for very short trips, and with that metric, is good value.
customer_reviews.author: Veritas

customer_reviews.title: Great value scooter w/minor issues
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Works as advertised. I weigh 225 lbs and this scooter works as smoothly as a Bird. Tires are big enough to run over cracked surfaces. The LED light was bright enough I could see objects at least 100 ft in front of me. It's easily portable and can fit in my car for use later! Cons: The folding latch keeps popping off, so I've been carrying that piece in my pocket while I ride the scooter. When I need to fold the scooter, I attach the latch onto the scooter, hook and carry it to my destination.
customer_reviews.author: TSim

customer_reviews.title: Great for my commute
customer_reviews.text: I work just over 5 miles from home & this thing can get me there & back with about 20% battery left over. My best was 16.7 mph, there are a couple decent hills along the way and it never dropped below 15 mph. One kick to get it going from a standstill is all that's needed & it accelerates quickly. I'm only 180 pounds, but for me this thing is great. Feels smooth, handles well. This thing is made really well & looks good too. Operation is very quiet & it's simply a joy to ride. Light & easy to carry with the folding design.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon4Me

customer_reviews.title: Needs better quality.
customer_reviews.text: It was good at the beginning. The only problem I had was it didn’t go up the hill I needed to push some but not a really big deal. After using it a couple of weeks the steering wheel loosened up and starting misaligning with the wheel this was already the second problem with it so I just returned it. The first problem I had it just stoped working the motor started to sound bad and it wouldn’t go I got the replacement and the other thing happened.
customer_reviews.author: Sarabelen

customer_reviews.title: If your tire pop’s they have no replacement
customer_reviews.text: This scooter was great when we 1st bought it, however the back tire went flat in less than QTY:10 rides. I tried desperately to reach out so I could purchase a new one and I was told they no longer make the tire needed for this model....Seriously??? I would not suggest ordering this scooter, as it’s impossible to get a spare tires, which you will need at some point.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: This POS got my blood boiling!
customer_reviews.text: Unboxed this POS to have it work for 5 min! then it just wouldn’t go. It made noises and had hard vibration when attempting to ride. The scooter looked like it had been opened used and returned by some else. Only one left in stock so I think they just boxed that defective returned scooter and sent it to me just to fulfill the order. Smh
customer_reviews.author: Marisol Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Dead in two months
customer_reviews.text: There is a two month warranty from Amazon for this scooter. The scooter no longer works after 2 months and 5 days. I guess whomever is determining the life span of this scooter really knows their stuff. For $270 I would expect this scooter to last longer. My son has put less than 5 miles on the scooter since Christmas. The scooter was garaged and fully charged the entire time. The scooter just seems to be poorly assembled.
customer_reviews.author: Ariashaka

customer_reviews.title: Excellent scooter for the money, but I wish I had spent some more and gotten shocks
customer_reviews.text: The scooter is fine; it was a good buy. Although if I bought another scooter, I would get one with shocks. I feel every little pebble or crack in the road that I ride over on this one. It’s also difficult to write on sidewalks and brick pavers. Another problem is the little piece of hardware that holds the screen scooter together fell off. I have to figure out how to fix that, if possible. It’s great to be able to Fold the scooter and carry it around. For the money, it’s a great scooter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must be light in weight
customer_reviews.text: I weigh 230pds and was so excited to receive this product. However, it is made for a much lighter party. I assume because of my weight, the scooter only went about 2-3 kilometers before the battery ran dry. Plus, switching to second gear posed an issue. The scooter never tells you if you are in or not in gear. When you do get into second gear, the scooter =battery runs out even faster. All things considered, for a lighter person, it would be good investment due to quality parts except the battery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected
customer_reviews.text: This scooter does have good battery life, it is easy to fold and was easy to assemble. However, about one month after we had opened the scooter the disc (brake) started making a rubbing sound and we discovered the steering can become unaligned and is hard to tighten properly. The scooter does have a good amount of power and rides well. However, the rear fender snapped-off the other day when my son was riding it (see pic). He said he didn't hit a bump or anything, the piece is completely broken off and the brake light is also on the fender.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi Ohtake

customer_reviews.title: Love It!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my boyfriend who has a bad knee and he has to walk a great distance to work from the car. He love it!! Very portable and easy to carry and fold up. He loves it and is worth the price. He weighs 230 lbs and is 6'1. He has no issues riding it. It also comes with a bell that you screw onto the handle which is cute to ring as you approach people walking. Good investment.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Dahl

customer_reviews.title: Great customer support
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our sons birthday and unfortunately the unit that arrived was faulty. With that said we contacted Megawheels customer support via email (no answer on phone after multiple attempts) and they were more than helpful and after a brief exchange of emails our new item arrived. This product is amazing and the only NEGATIVE thing we can say is our family likes it so much we will be buying several more. Truly the only slight disappointment was the amount of time it took them to reply and ship our new unit (2 weeks). But regardless we are 100% satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Wes Riddle

customer_reviews.title: Solid buld, rides good but battery is a letdown.
customer_reviews.text: I looked extensivly for a escooter and decided on this model. I was extremely happy with everything except the battery life...which is a deal breaker for me unfortunatly. I could barely get 6 miles on a charge which doesnt meet my needs. I will probably need to return this and spend a little more to get the range I need. Other than that its really a nice escooter
customer_reviews.author: M. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Port Hopper
customer_reviews.text: I bought two scooters to keep on the boat for cruising around towns we visit. They store easily and are easy to load/unload from the boat. Batteries seem to charge faster then what the manual says. I couldn't find in the manual how to shift into high gear and after playing around found that you push the power button twice fast it will shift. These scooters are very quiet so the bell is nice to warn people while riding. I gave them a four only because we haven't had them that long and can't say how the scooter holds up to being used around town and had to ride any hills.
customer_reviews.author: Kato

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer support.....
customer_reviews.text: Excellent customer support, mine had a problem with the throttle, I call customer support, immediately a guy name Brian call me and listen my problem with my scooter, right away he sent me a free returning label, and in 6 days I got a new scooter with is working 100% great. Thanks to customer support specially to Brian
customer_reviews.author: Jose gabriel lugo

customer_reviews.title: Bad Situation turned good
customer_reviews.text: To start things off I bought this scooter on August 9, 2019. I have been riding it almost every other day and just riding normal, no stunt riding or driving off curbs. About 2 days ago I head my rear fender slapping against the wheel, I get off to discover this big crack in the rear fender. So now whenever I ride over bumps, cracks, or down sidewalk crossings the rear fender slaps against the wheel and creates a ton of noise. EDIT - I have been contacted by customer service to get this resolved. This situation was bad but was turned good. I would recommend this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Marie Weir

customer_reviews.title: A MUST buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is singlehandedly one of the greatest purchases Ive ever made in my amazon history. This thing cruises so fast its unbelievable. I cannot believe I did not go for it sooner but luckily I never once doubted it for another scooter. If you are thinking about buying this, please take my word for it and do it!
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Battery Life
customer_reviews.text: The battery craps out after 3-4 miles, maybe shorter if you are going up a hill which it barely handles a 15% incline. We have an ES2 and ES4 from Segway and there is no comparison. The build and brake system is good, too bad the battery is crap. Will be sending this back.
customer_reviews.author: MAGA

customer_reviews.title: Who knows -
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn’t power on. Did everything tech said, never offered warranty assistance... give us video, do this and do that... frustrating. Didn’t work day one out of the box. Felt bounced around and never got to resolution.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew hester

customer_reviews.title: Good, until the handles break loose
customer_reviews.text: My first few days with scooter were great and had no problem, the speed is really good, and the overall experience with this scooter is nice... The only problem I had with it was the locking device that is at the base of the handles' tube. When at a high speed and with the help of a not so clean street to ride through, the locking device can get loose easily as well as the handles, and with that an accident can occur. I almost got in an accident twice in the same day. So now, I have to worry about the locking thing all the time at every corner to make sure I don't get into an accident.
customer_reviews.author: Andres

customer_reviews.title: Caution, did not last long and burned up.  No response from manufacturer.
customer_reviews.text: After 3 months of use the front end became loose and the handlebar assembly started moving independently of the front wheel. I was unable to determine how to tighten it and so contacted the seller (China) via email. No response. Continued to use it for another month, but kept it slow and had to manually align the handlebar assembly with the front wheel frequently. Two weeks ago, mid ride I felt friction on the front wheel, then suddenly smoke started pouring out of the handlebar assembly and a smell of burnt electronics. Another email to the Chinese vendor went unanswered. Scratched it to a poor product, poor customer service, and a loss. Posted this review. Beware!
customer_reviews.author: Mike D

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional Customer Service- great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son's birthday. It's a great scooter, very substantial and the battery life is surprisingly long. The best part of this entire experience, however, has been the customer service. I literally feel like Daniel (customer service rep) is sitting at his computer, waiting for me to email him. Is it waterproof? What's the best lock to use? It seems to have come out of alignment- what do you suggest? I always get a personal email back within a few hours. If every business treated customers this way, we should all be so lucky. I would completely recommend this product because even if something goes wrong, they will make it right immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Stedry

customer_reviews.title: Fun and Pretty Fast
customer_reviews.text: I put this thing through hell. It was a great way to get around. Only downside is the battery life really starts to die within only about a week of having it. I had to take my charger with me everywhere I went
customer_reviews.author: Justin Stone

customer_reviews.title: NO WARRANTY DON'T BUY
customer_reviews.text: If you battery dies in 3 months you have to ship scooter to New Jersey for repair at your expense. Seller does not stand behind product. If you item does not work after 3 months, it should be replaced. This should have lasted much longer. Going to file a claim.
customer_reviews.author: LCP

customer_reviews.title: Great price for solid scooter
customer_reviews.text: Great scooter. Bought it few days ago to ride next to my kid, whom is on bike. No more running after kids when I can ride next to them. Anyway, scooter performed great in 4 rides I took. Battery holds very well and I was able to go 15 miles per hr. Tires grip very well. I would recommend it to all.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Really bad battery life.
customer_reviews.text: Shortly after I got it the locking mechanism to hold the handle to the body of the scooter fell off. The biggest thing is instead of getting 13 miles on a single charge I am down to 2.5 miles before it dies. I was told by manufacture I could send it back but I would have to pay shipping fee which would be from Atlanta to New Jersey including the box $128.I am not paying that that’s just shy of half of what I paid for the scooter itself. I would not recommend the scooter!!
customer_reviews.author: Todd Carr

customer_reviews.title: Battery Malfunction
customer_reviews.text: I bought my scooter last week, and since I first started riding it the battery has been malfunctioned. After charging during the whole night the battery drops to 40% after a minute. I gave more than one try, but the issue persists. Also, the scooter makes a really loud noise every time that I'm riding on it. Additionally, the vertical bar is not aligned to the horizontal one, making me bending to one side if I don't turn a little bit. I'm very disappointed with this scooter. Customer service provided a new scooter and I shipped back the old one. Hopefully, I won’t have any issue with the new one.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I'm 6'4 and 250lbs and it carries me with ease! A little longer battery life wouldn't hurt but with my size can't expect too much. However, THE BEST CUSTOMER SERVICE YOU WILL EVER RECEIVE! Any issue they are ready to help. 💯
customer_reviews.author: WAYMON

customer_reviews.title: Battery Life and Speed Not as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: I bought this scooter to commute 2 miles on a straight flat bike bath in NYC. Was very excited because the reviews were pretty great, however I am already sending it back. 1) It is MUCH slower than advertised, it took me 40 minutes to go 2 miles 2) The battery was fully charged and by the time I got 30 minutes in, it was down to 1 bar 3) It is SO HEAVY so carrying it to the elevator after folding it was very difficult. Overall would not recommend and I am really disappointed, as I really wanted this scooter to work out!
customer_reviews.author: casey bakker

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Have had two of these scooters for a couple months now. For short rides around the neighborhood and errands, they're perfect. Customer service is also great, got caught in a rain storm and the water caused the scooter to break... had a new one at my door within a week. Was very happy about that. Only con for the price point is there's nearly no way to lock it properly.
customer_reviews.author: David H.

customer_reviews.title: Good Scooter. Brakes?
customer_reviews.text: The scooter rides well. It is sturdy, well-made and fun to ride. The brakes grab terribly, and make stopping difficult. My guess is the brake disc is out of round. If you look at the video you can hear them grab in one spot. Waiting for a reply from customer support.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Sabers

customer_reviews.title: GARBAGE..
customer_reviews.text: GARBAGE!!!! When I first purchased it (40 days ago) I thought it was good for the price. After a few rides, I realized how wrong I was. 1st. The battery life is grossly overstated. I have averaged 6 miles at best. 2nd, on my most recent and last ride, the plastic rear fender, cracked in half while at top speed, the rear light is mounted to the fender and it jammed under the rear tire. It caused me to loose control and almost wipe out. 3, the front lock, which keeps the handlebars upright has come loose. I no longer trust it as it wobbles so much.
customer_reviews.author: Hadriam Vega

customer_reviews.title: So much fun
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband for his birthday and he LOVES it...so do I. Sooooo fun. I got it for him to commute to work in our small town. It’s perfect. Smooth ride, quick easy charge, easy to drive. Our 4 year old daughter rides with him. Great scooter for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent scooter.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent scooter. Very well made. Will buy a 2nd one for my wife.
customer_reviews.author: G. Neale

customer_reviews.title: Great Scooter
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this scooter last month ( June 2019) and have been really happy with it. I use it as my daily commuter to and from work, which is about 8 miles one way. The battery lasts and the speed is competitive with other bikers and does go about 15 MPH (the speed fluctuates based on hills, wind, weight etc...). I'm really happy with this purchase and recommend the company. I've contacted customer service a couple of times and they've been more than helpful.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY! DONT WASTE UR TIME
customer_reviews.text: not worth it. it originally worked but the clasp that help up the handles was so flimsy if it went over . a small crack it would collapse which is an horrible accident waiting to happen. couldn't believe tit was designed so poorly. it also would only go half as fast as advertised and the charge would run out far too fast. thankfully we kept the box and were able to return it without having to pay shipping. such a waste of time honestly.
customer_reviews.author: Sana M

customer_reviews.title: Poorly and Cheaply Designed Clipping Mechanism
customer_reviews.text: It may just be my scooter, but I am very disappointed. When folding the scooter back up, the clip is supposed to click into place to make sure the handle bar is locked upright. My scooter’s clip DOES NOT click into place. I believe the clipping mechanism is poorly and cheaply designed. On a good note though, it’s got great speed and was a ton of fun to ride for a commute.
customer_reviews.author: dhoffmann68

customer_reviews.title: Battery Life Not Worth It
customer_reviews.text: The battery life is what really made this a nightmare. I did everything I could to make sure the battery life won’t change too badly, but I was barely making it to my job on a full charge after 3 weeks. I love how easy it was to drive and very smooth, but the battery is terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but only use it on paved surfaces
customer_reviews.text: The scooter is fast and the range is good. It’s well built, but only use the scooter on paved surfaces like sidewalks and asphalt. I used it on grass and other rough terrain and it deflated the tire to the point where it slipped off on a hill. The customer service was nice and helpful when I needed a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Tech guy of tech

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing!
customer_reviews.text: I was excited when I received this scooter. Charged the batter per instructions and when I turned it on everything seemed ok. Then after 30 minutes it stopped working. I plugged in the battery just in case it hadn't charged the first time around but it didn't work. The entire thing just wasn't turning on period. Needless to say this was very disappointing! I requested a replacement and we will see how that replacement performs. sigh........
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Casillas

customer_reviews.title: Solid Solid Solid
customer_reviews.text: Honestly this is exactly what i expected from this scooter. Well built and rides smooth. It is not the fastest thing in the world but its perfect for commutes and rides. The battery life is less than advertised but that is to be expected and I ride about 2 miles a day on it during the work week and need to charge it once every 3-4 days of ride so not too shabby
customer_reviews.author: Betsy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to control and learn
customer_reviews.text: WOW Easy to learn for the entire family This is a very sturdy scooter that folds for portable transport. This electric scooter is good for grass, gravel or paved roads due to the pneumatic tires. Has full set of lights so you can take it for a ride safely.The breaks are very responsive so get used to them. Great fun and long lasting scooter. Always remember to wear your helmets.
customer_reviews.author: MERCY

customer_reviews.title: SUPERSTAR!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing rocks, my daughter purchased to get to campus instead of buying a parking pass. Goes well, at a high speed up hills. She has no problems making the 3 mile trek from her apartment to campus- GO HOKIES!
customer_reviews.author: Penny Powell

customer_reviews.title: Low quality product
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I don’t like to write bad reviewers, but I am very disappointed after trying two different scooters from megawheels. The first one shutdown after I left it charging for 5 hours. The second one broke apart in the junction that we fold it.
customer_reviews.author: Bonieke Rodrigues de Azevedo

customer_reviews.title: Sucks!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was a good product till the battery died. It did not last more then 6 months. Then the manufacturer gave me a hard time when trying to get a refund. I had bought this for my son and didn’t get to enjoy as o would have love him too.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel

customer_reviews.title: Very quality scooter
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. I got this to be able to run errands in town. It is easy to learn how to use. It goes pretty fast. Makes it faster to do errands. Very good quality scooter. Battery lasts a week.
customer_reviews.author: Taxlady

customer_reviews.title: Positive Customer Support
customer_reviews.text: I bought the scooter for my daughter and experienced some issues. I contacted their support team and after several e-mails, they agreed to replace the scooter. The new scooter arrived as promised, the old one was returned and we are now enjoying the scooter. It is easy-to-assemble and runs quite well. I appreciate a company that stands behind its product and does the right thing for the consumer.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Novicki

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is sturdy, fast and fun to ride! The price is unbeatable. I got this for my sone for Christmas and he uses it daily around the neighborhood. Very happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Pete Lozzi

customer_reviews.title: You can control the speed.  Great light and reflective details for at night. Very fun!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this scooter as a birthday gift for my son (age 11). I made sure it could also hold either my husband or myself. It is so fun and easy to use and fold back up. It has reflective details and the light is very bright. You can control the speed easily. I definitely recommend this scooter. I also recommend a helmet just for safety and peace of mind. I would definitely buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Fitz

customer_reviews.title: This scooter is dangerous the clip quits working and you will crash when you go over a bump.
customer_reviews.text: I seriously almost killed myself on the scooter. It worked for a good week or two. . And then the clip that folds it upright quit working. Went over a bump and crashed. Hard got lots of road rash dangerous dangerous dangerous a scooter. By the way, I had to replace the scooter the first time. Because the turning thing got stripped out. No way to retighten it. Unhappy Seriously a liability be careful using this product. Please please please.
customer_reviews.author: Jere Dorr

customer_reviews.title: If you're on the fence, buy it worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: This scooter is awesome. I bought it because I'm a bigger guy 6ft 260lbs and this scooter doesn't miss a beat. Well worth the money. This thing is seriously built.
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: Kick A$$
customer_reviews.text: This thing kicks ass! It’s fast and zippy and so much fun!
customer_reviews.author: madnmel

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect scooter for short trips. My daughter uses it around the neighborhood. It is super sturdy. Headlight / twilight a plus. Good value and exactly as advertised. Would recommend this for adults / teens.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Diersing

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: For under $400, I have reliable transportation to and from work. It was easier than I thought to ride the scooter and it makes the commute fun. Look no further in your searches. Megawheels is the way to go. The S5 is truly a 5-star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Elo

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy...customer service is terrible!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this scooter. It lasted 6 months and it doesn’t charge. The company has no phone number to contact them. I ordered a new charger and new finder and don’t need it bc the problem is not in the charger. The box came with no return label and they will not respond. I can send the scooter back to them to be worked on for 60.00. My son loved it but I’ll buy him one from a different company. Very disappointed buyer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The clip to open and close opens when riding ! Very dangerous !
customer_reviews.text: I have had this scooter for less than 2 months and now the clip to fold the scooter closed keeps unhooking when I ride it ! It’s been happening consistently for the past 2 days whenever I hit a bump in the road or hit on the breaks... I am attempting to contact customer service.
customer_reviews.author: R.W

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy This Scooter!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this on August 2019 and been using ever since. I use it for a short trip from parking to work. A 7 mins travel to be specific. Noticed that the battery drains every after use. Have to charge everyday now. The handle is also shaped oddly. Hard to grip. If I can turn back time I will not buy this scooter.Period!
customer_reviews.author: Aj

customer_reviews.title: Check handle bars
customer_reviews.text: I experienced one problem with the right side handle of the scooter.. it doesn't appear to be tighten, wobbles. I've contacted the seller, Daniel, via email about 4 times already, I've not received a response since early March. Drives fast, both my kids and I enjoy it, however, don't feel safe with handle feeling as if it's not secure...hope to hear from them soon to get handle replaced
customer_reviews.author: Angelica Perez

customer_reviews.title: Poor customer service
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these scooters paid for the additional warranty , the one scooter got a flat was sent a new tire with no directions on how to replace it. The tire came with wires exposed . We tried to send it back for repair was told to watch you tube to see how to take the tire off. After many attempts we are now able to send back , this had been a nightmare dealing with their customer service
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Warranty Info
customer_reviews.text: Scooter was decent other than battery life than promised, but my latch that allows the scooter to collapse has failed and I can't find any warranty contact info for this item.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer A.

customer_reviews.title: 13 year will love it
customer_reviews.text: My son is turning 13 so I wanted something when around the neighborhood, down at the beach or visiting friends he could have some independence. I just got the scooter ready for Christmas Eve (kids live with their mom). It’s very easy to assemble and was ready to go within minutes. I took the dog for a 3 mile run on it. I’m 220lbs and it ran great. Any 13 year old will love it.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: If you are trying to get a nice long lasting battery and fast scooter then don’t buy this one. 3 months with this scooter and the hook to for it broke and now battery starts dying not even after 1 mile!! I gotta be charging it every 15 mins it’s unreal How they sell these things offering a good battery life. Don’t buy it get a better product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken Bell and No Cruise Control
customer_reviews.text: The scooter came with a broken bell and bell strap. The bell won’t even stay on the scooter. And there is no cruise control so I have to constantly push on it to commute.
customer_reviews.author: kitty

customer_reviews.title: Speed and battery life runs down fast
customer_reviews.text: I used Megawheel for my daily commute between work and home so it’s pretty easy to fold wile in bus or train. The speed is fine but it’s been 4 months and speed has decreased from 12 to 7 miles per hour . The battery runs out quickly and had to recharge it twice a day. I don’t know what I can do to increase the speed limit back to normal and battery too.
customer_reviews.author: Zokten Dokersur

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Light fell off, and the stick with the handles on it isn’t aligned with the wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Orly

customer_reviews.title: A good deal for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and fold. Solidly built and pretty fast. Lots of fun and no problem moving me at 195 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Alfred Basso

customer_reviews.title: For the price it’s hard to beat just wish it didnt have that front we all handle bar issue
customer_reviews.text: This scooter is great for short trips or just playing around the neighborhood it’s not very fast but it seems to do what it supposed to do The only issue I have is the steering column seems to loosen from the front wheel resulting in handle bars being held straight but the wheel is turned to the side I keep tightening it but it keeps happening
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Beckham

customer_reviews.title: Must have for late night neighborhood rides
customer_reviews.text: Awesome love it . Better than swagtron by a long shot.
customer_reviews.author: Jason holt

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son in college. Bad bad bad!! The handle bar screwed off constantly until it and fell who nows where!!!!! i would not spend money on this. I say pay a bit more and get the real deal. $400 down the drain!
customer_reviews.author: lopez951

customer_reviews.title: It Can’t Handle the weight it claims going uphill
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. It looks nice and feels nice. On a flat road it’s pretty good but I bought it to take me up the hills. I weigh 212 llbs and it completely stopped on a medium gradient. Even on a really mild slope it slowed down to less than a regular walking pace. Also the battery power drained by 50% in 10 mins. I would not recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: charles ludlow

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Scooter
customer_reviews.text: We camp a lot and what a perfect way to get around! Great for home also, we use them everywhere (we have 2). This scooter is awesome. Goes up a smaller hill great, powerful and made very well. Shipping was really fast. Highly recommend this scooter!
customer_reviews.author: Leah Coole

customer_reviews.title: Find another model
customer_reviews.text: P.O.S. Trash item. Bought 2. Plastic over rear wheel broke on one. The other has a stripped screw and doesn’t stay straight when riding. And it won’t fold. I would have rather lit my cash on fire then buy these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: I bought the scooter for about a mile of commuting round trip. The first scooter made a terrible squeaking sound all the time. I returned it. The replacement has problems with turning so I have to get off after about 45 seconds of riding to readjust the wheel. I’m not doing anything wrong and I well below the weight limit. Terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Braggins

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: This electric car is perfect. good quality. The speed is also very fast. The hype is simple and does not require installation. You can use him when you arrive.
customer_reviews.author: it is awesome by jerry

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: The only problem i am really upset with is i baught 2 scooters. 1 of them has break issues. The second has a ticking noise in the front tirer that i do not know what it is. I baught it for my son and i to ride and have only been able to ride once. Going to need to return and look for another brand. Itbwas his Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: Hicidro Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Not happy, one use then unrideable
customer_reviews.text: Rode it once, the handle bar neck and front wheel became loose causing the scooter to not be able to be Ridden. Can’t find any I formation on how to tighten it.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy G.

customer_reviews.title: Best for the price
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been pleased with my purchase. I was a little disappointed with the battery life but other than very impressed. After a month of repeated use, I ran over a piece of glass which popped my rear tire. The customer service has been great though with fast response time and got my repair parts shipped to me immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Broke after a few rides. Didn’t hit anything or abuse it.
customer_reviews.author: Eric V. Traut

customer_reviews.title: 3 weeks dead
customer_reviews.text: It last only for 3 weeks.Amazon gave full refund.They can't replace battery
customer_reviews.author: skm

customer_reviews.title: Bad investment
customer_reviews.text: I do not like that I just got this scooter September 5 and on September 9, the handle bars twist and turn. Now the scooter doe work properly. I am very disappointed with the mega wheels scooter because I thought it would be reliable and unfortunately it's a very bad scooter that looks good but not worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Hampton

customer_reviews.title: Stuck with a scooter that doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.text: The gas “pedal” broke on the last day of eligibility t return the scooter. Now I’m stuck with a scooter that won’t work and I can’t return it.
customer_reviews.author: jenna

customer_reviews.title: Great scooter!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this new scooter, Light weight and stylish. The battery of this thing is pretty good and the ride is smooth as well. Breaks can use some improvement. Overall, this is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Ming

customer_reviews.title: Keeps dying
customer_reviews.text: The battery on this scooter did not hold up. Have done all the manual said and everyday I take it out after a night charge and same thing. Gets to 2 blue lights then dead. The customer service from the company was exceptional and they genuinely seemed to care and take the feed back to fix the problem.
customer_reviews.author: J. Summerland

customer_reviews.title: Great adult scooter!!
customer_reviews.text: Great scooter for adults. My husband and I cruise around the neighborhood on this. Battery lasts great and holds up to 260lbs. It’s equivalent to riding a bird or line scooter. Great fun!!
customer_reviews.author: goodieL

customer_reviews.title: Sluggish
customer_reviews.text: Does not even go 2 miles on 1 charge and they say 13
customer_reviews.author: Sam German

customer_reviews.title: Out of the box and will not charge!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this scooter, but it will not charge. The carver light does not change colors as it says to expect. No one answers at customer service and voicemail is full. Avoid this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good choice of electric scooter
customer_reviews.text: Battery is very good, one charge good for 2 week of light use, easy to handle.
customer_reviews.author: HENRY CHUNG

customer_reviews.title: good scooter but my lock is all jam up
customer_reviews.text: i bought this scooter on my birthdat march 7. its work pretty good and after a month past the handle bar for the lock is all jam up and couldnt pull out it out stuck. i am going to make edit when i contact the customer service to see if they can help me.
customer_reviews.author: patrick gomez

customer_reviews.title: A Great Ride
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy engineering, good speed, easy to fold, terrific customer support. It is like waterskiing on pavement.
customer_reviews.author: Frederick G. Ostrom

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I loved the customer service. It was amazing. The battery life lasts as long as they say. Even though the first one i got got messed up they sent in a completely new one. It lasts as long as it's supposed too. Goes from the middle of Manhattan to the middle of Brooklyn too. It's a great scooter.
customer_reviews.author: Jagerjaquezzzzzz

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend to anybody
customer_reviews.text: i love my new mega wheels i also love that random people stop me to ask me about it and where i bought it
customer_reviews.author: ana

customer_reviews.title: Quality problem
customer_reviews.text: I received it at the beginning, I was like ,but in the use of two weeks after I found the probiem, the front wheel steering problems,always appear tilt problem between it and handle,and worse,is now very loose,it brings a lot of trouble in my driving because it's my turn to greater radian,and I was worried that one day it will break
customer_reviews.author: sonji

product_meta.title: MEGAWHEELS S5 Electric Scooter, 10 Miles Long Range Battery, Up to 15.5 MPH, 8.5" Pneumatic Tires, Portable and Folding Electric Scooter for Short Commutes and Trips
feature_bullets: 【Long Range Battery Life】A powerful 250W motor propels the electric scooter to a max speed of 15.5 MPH. Ultra high capacity 5800 mAh LG lithium battery can support a maximum commuting range up to 10 miles, 5 LED battery indicators on the dashboard indicate remaining battery capacity.

【Portable Folding Design】 Made of aircraft-grade aluminum alloy, higher strength, lighter weight, weighs only 27.5 lbs, max load: 264 lbs, which can be quickly folded and released within 3 seconds, wherever you are, you can easily carry and store it.

【8.5" Pneumatic Tires】With advanced 8.5" shock-absorbing and anti-slip pneumatic tires to make your ride more comfortable and safe. Equipped with a mechanical disc braking on the rear wheel and a electronic braking on the front wheel to ensure braking system safer.

【Intelligent and Humanized Design】Features 2 Speed Modes-the first mode for a 11 MPH slow speed and the second mode to get a 15.5MPH fast speed, equipped with a ultra bright LED headlights for night riding and red taillight to warn pedestrians and vehicles behind.

【MegaWheels Values and Belief】We believe that only quality products are able to make customers feel joyful while using them. MegaWheels has a professional technical support team to 7x24 standby for customer service, your satisfaction is our priority target!
